  • Cures at room temperature

    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Clear
    Origin Country United Kingdom
    Product Type Instant Adhesives
    Size 1 lb, 453 g

    Product Information

  • One-part instant adhesive
  • Super fast setting
  • Designed to adhere difficult-to-bond plastics and rubbers, acidic, or contaminated surfaces
  • Especially useful in high speed production applications requiring a super fast cure
  • Relies less on surface moisture for cure speed than typical instant adhesives

    • Suggested Application

  • Intended for joining, gluing, attaching, assembling, combining, repairing, panel & trim bonding, adhering, and structural bonding
  • Alternative to riveting or welding, bolt setting, frame building, rivet free assembly

  • 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Super Fast Instant Adhesive SF100 is a low-viscosity, instant adhesive
